# React Starter Kit

> Production-ready monorepo for building fast web apps

Skip months of setup and ship your AI-powered SaaS fast. Authentication, database migrations, edge deployment, and cutting-edge React patterns all configured with industry best practices.

## Table of Contents

- [Introduction](/getting-started.md)
